About
=====
My name is Ayoub Malek; I grew up near Monastir [Tunisia]. I graduated from high-school on 2012 with honor and moved to Germany for my engineering studies.
Since 2013 I am based in Munich [Germany], where I study electrical engineering at the Technical University of Munich [TUM].
Iâ€™m a big fan of sports, cyberculture and an enthusiastic programmer.
